main event: A UFO sighting was reported over Las Vegas, Nevada on 12 November 1957 by a TWA pilot and observed on radar control, with no photographs included in the document.
interesting points: The UFO was described as an orbiting object with bright lights, similar to landing lights on an aircraft.
The object was noticed on the cast leg at Las Overtack Project by a TWA pilot.
Radar control site lost the object on radar, increasing the mystery surrounding the sighting.
The document mentions the altitude and traffic pattern of several flights in the area at the time of the sighting.
The report suggests that the UFO may have been a balloon, USAF aircraft, or an astronomical object, but the conclusion remains inconclusive.
sighted object: an orbiting object with bright lights
witnesses: TWA pilot, radar control site personnel
